name: Dublin Unity User Group (DUUG)
blurb: This is a group for people who use Unity3D for everything: from educational to gaming, and from every aspect. From Modeling and development to design and texturing. We will try to organize monthly events in which in the future we will discuss about topics, ideas and why not, we will organize some presentation to explain newbies the unity3D world involving them to the wonderful world of 3D that we like so much.
